alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:24PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Prowers, Baca and eastern Bent Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 623 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of McClave to 9 miles southwest of Campo. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Campo around 640 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lamar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
